Steve Locke (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nké na-enyocha ihe oyiyi na nghọta nkè nwoke, na isiokwu nke nwoke na nwoke idina nwoke site na ise ihe.
ihe osise, ihe ọkpụkpụ na nka ntinye
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn, New York, ébé ọ na-akụzi na Pratt Institute.
A mụrụ Locke na Cleveland, Ohio, ma zụlite ya na Detroit, Michigan
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2002 na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na Skow Hegan, Maine
Ọ natara MFA ya na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na 2001 ma nwee nzèrè bachelọ na Mahadum Boston na Massachusetts College nke Art and Design.
Ihe osise Lockeʹs na-enyocha ihe a na-etinye na foto nwoke
Ọrụ ya nwèrè ọtụtụ foto nke ndị ikom - ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri, ọ rụgharịrị otu mmegharị ahụ nke nwoke na ire ya na-anọdụ n'ọnụ ya
"Ọ na-esiri ike ime ihe osise nke nwoke ma ghara ime ka ọ dị mkpa
Ya mèrè, m bịara na mmegharị a dị egwu, "Locke kọwara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Institute of Contemporary Art, Boston

"Ọ na-amasị m na ha abụghị ndị dike, na ha anaghị ejikọta ya na ahụ ọ bụla, "ka o kwuru banyéré ihe ya, nke dị n'etiti ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe osise. "Ha na-ese n'elu ikuku, na-echere inwe onye, ma ọ bụ banye n'ime isi gị ma gbanwee gị
" Ebumnuche ya bụ "ime ihe osise nke ndị ikom na-adịghị ike, ma ọ bụ ndị a kpughere, n'ejighị ihe doro anya nke ịgba ọtọ". Ọrụ ya na-akpali mkparịta ụka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mmekọahụ na nka.

Locke bụbu prọfesọ na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na Boston, ma na-akụzi ugbu a na Pratt Institute. E nyèrè Locke onyinye Art Matters, na-eleta Istanbul na 2007 iji hụ Blue Mosque na Hagia Sophia na mmasị pụrụ iche na ịchọpụta isiokwu ndị dị ka patterning, ịchọ mma, calligraphy, na eserese mgbidi. N'afọ 2008, ọ bụ prọfesọ nleta na ónyé na-ese ihe na Savannah College of Art and Design.
